sentences.en: Certain boll shapes and absence of nectarines reduces easy avenues of penetration into the boll.
sentences.cn: 某些铃形和无蜜腺减少病菌容易进入棉铃的途径.

sentences.en: Cover the entire device to prevent water penetration.
sentences.cn: 把整台设备都罩住以免进水。

sentences.en: Incising can achieve the same penetration advantages.
sentences.cn: 刻痕具有渗透度一致的好处.

sentences.en: It is important to get even distribution of water and good penetration.
sentences.cn: 灌水时水量均匀分布和充分渗透是很重要的.

sentences.en: Multichannel sparker recording has recently come into use for shallow - penetration.
sentences.cn: 多道火花发生器记录系统,最近开始已在浅层勘测中应用.

sentences.en: Only the penetration method has been used to any appreciable extent.
sentences.cn: 只有穿透法获得了较广泛的应用.

sentences.en: Our aim is to achieve greater market penetration.
sentences.cn: 我们的目标是进一步打入市场.

sentences.en: Penetration in matter depends on the kinetic energy of the electrons, E.
sentences.cn: 在物质中的贯穿能力,都是和电子的动能E有关的.

sentences.en: The change from George Robertson to Sir George Staunton, baffled even the penetration of Ratcliffe.
sentences.cn: 乔治?罗伯逊摇身一变为乔治?斯汤顿爵士, 老练的拉特克利夫也不免失算.

sentences.en: the company's successful penetration of overseas markets
sentences.cn: 公司对海外市场的顺利开拓

sentences.en: The deepest penetration up to date is a distance of thirty - eight miles as the crow flies.
sentences.cn: 截至目前,突入敌军阵地最深的是直线距离三十八哩.

sentences.en: The floor is sealed to prevent water penetration.
sentences.cn: 地板加了密封涂料防止渗水。

sentences.en: The penetration of a particle into the lung is influenced by air velocities breathing patterns.
sentences.cn: 颗粒物对肺的穿透作用受气流速度和呼吸形式的影响.

sentences.en: These are the result of the penetration of the larvae into the crypts.
sentences.cn: 这些是幼虫钻入滤泡的结果.

sentences.en: They dazzle the penetration of the composer.
sentences.cn: 他们使作家的洞察力混乱.

sentences.en: They gaily ascended the downs , rejoicing in their own penetration at every glimpse of blue sky.
sentences.cn: 她们兴高采烈地登上山冈, 非常高兴能仔细观察湛蓝的云彩的每一次隐约的闪现.

sentences.en: You didn't get penetration even with the elephant gun.
sentences.cn: 即使有杀大象的枪,你也无法击穿它.

trans.tran_en: when something or someone enters or passes through something, especially when this is difficult
